lead_paragraph: STROM--Victor T.,age 90, of Ridgewood, NJ and Lake George, NY, on April 19, 2016. Beloved husband of Neva M. (nee Nichols). Loving father of Neva D. Strom (Thomas L. Dula), Dina Grant, and the late Rolf T. Strom. Adoring grandfather of Nikolas and Hannah Dula, and John, George, and Katherine Grant. Cherished brother of the late Elise Strom and the late Robert Strom. Victor was a 35 year employee of the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey, and retired as the Director of Public Safety. He was the rock of his community, and his loving care and wisdom will be greatly missed. A memorial service, with reception to follow, will be held on June 17th at 4pm at West Side Presbyterian Church, 6 South Monroe St., Ridgewood, NJ. Feeneyfuneralhome.com. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  STROM, VICTOR T.
